i3.suggestion: Software updates contain critical security patches. Automate them.

i5.suggestion: Router defaults are often guessable. Change them.

i6.answerText: Automated cloud backup + Local drive (3-2-1 rule).

i7.suggestion: Limit your blast radius. Don't let strangers profile you.

i8.suggestion: Real-time vacation posts tell burglars your house is empty.

i9.suggestion: Financial transactions need secure channels. Never use public Wi-Fi.

i11.suggestion: Debit cards link to your cash. Use Credit Cards for fraud protection.

i12.suggestion: Curiosity is an attack vector. Attachments are dangerous.

i13.suggestion: Data sticks around. Securely wipe devices before disposal.

i15.answerText: Verify their ID then verify details.
i15.suggestion: Banks don't call you to ask for PINs. Hang up and call back.

i16.suggestion: Your phone is your life keys. Lock it properly.

i17.suggestion: RATs (Remote Access Trojans) are real. Cover your cam.

i18.suggestion: Zombie accounts get breached. Delete what you don't use.

i20.suggestion: Free VPNs sell your data. If you want privacy, pay for it.
